title: Capstone Project for Pharmaceutical Leaders: Leadership and Management Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning reflecting actual pharmacy/hospital environments

learning_goals: Students can plan and execute leadership projects addressing real-world pharmaceutical challenges within six weeks
Learners self-assess team management and decision-making competencies at 4.0/5.0 or higher on the Likert scale
At course completion, 85%+ of students can present case studies applying multidisciplinary collaboration protocols
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
